text: Carolyn M. Squires (September 25, 1940 - March 21, 2016) was an American politician. She was a member of the Democratic Party. Squires was a member of the Montana House of Representatives for the 96th district from 2010 to 2015. From 2002 to 2010, she was a member of the Montana Senate, representing District 48, where she served as Majority Whip. Earlier she was a member of the Montana House of Representatives from 1987 through 2000. Squires died in Missoula, Montana from colorectal cancer at the age of 75. ==References== ==Other websites== *Project Vote Smart - Senator Carolyn M.
